attributes.action: To give David Beckham a Peerage.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: David Beckham should be given a peerage for his Charity work, which he actually gets involved in. Also for helping to keep the UK in the Worlds eye. This would shut those people who say they are for sale. David is a honest bloke.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
